text: Ur kwen Ipqassa Öebbi $ef tgallit n tkerkas. Maca, a kwen Iqiss $ef tgallit n ûûeê. Takweffaôt is: a ppecceççem mraw ime$ban, akken tecceççam tawacult nnwen, ne$ a ten tesselsem, ne$ a pserêem i wakli. Win ur nwâa ara, ad iuéum krav wussan. D tagi ay d takweffaôt n tgallit nnwen, ma teggullem. Eîîfet di tgallit nnwen. Akka i wen d Ipbeggin Öebbi issekniyen, amar a ppesnemmrem
